name: discord
title: Discord
description: Discord Bot API integration for guilds, channels, and messages

operations.name: list_guilds
operations.title: List Guilds
operations.description: Fetch guilds the bot is a member of

limit.description: Number of guilds to return (max 200, default 50)

before.description: Get guilds before this guild ID

after.description: Get guilds after this guild ID

operations.name: get_guild
operations.title: Get Guild
operations.description: Fetch a single guild by ID

operations.name: list_channels
operations.title: List Channels
operations.description: Fetch all channels in a guild

limit.description: Number of messages to return (max 100, default 50)

before.description: Get messages before this message ID

after.description: Get messages after this message ID

around.description: Get messages around this message ID

operations.name: send_message
operations.title: Send Message
operations.description: Send a message to a channel

operations.name: get_user
operations.title: Get User
operations.description: Fetch a Discord user by ID

limit.description: Number of members to return (max 1000, default 50)

after.description: Get members after this user ID

operations.name: create_channel
operations.title: Create Channel
operations.description: Create a new channel in a guild

type.description: Channel type (0 = text, 2 = voice, 4 = category, default 0)
